name: Chital Box w/Plain Inlay
description: The Chital Box with its amorphous shape is both beautiful and functional. The boxes are inlaid in either shagreen or pen shell and finished with a beautiful thin bronze-patina brass border that follows the shape of the piece. Available in 3 sizes and different finishes. Currently made to order 5-6 weeks. Handmade. Shagreen, Shell & Bronze-Patina Brass. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines.
